ygData.msgSnippet: OK I get the idea and that change all (I think) since technoligy is involved it can fail, miss the target, eve not damage and all Unicron and have all things

OK

I get the idea and that change all (I think) since technoligy is 
involved it can fail, miss the target, eve not damage and all 
Unicron and have all things that a tech-spect could do. What do you 
say Azur and Robo? did we let Jerame the post? 

BTW I sent you a mail.

Cya

Airly
--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> Alrighty now guys to explain on my Plane of Existance. I never 
actually said that he successfully did it. I put in
> "He then Locks on the the Solar Flare and intesifyes it spout and 
Directs its  raw Force Towards Unicron" Which means its raw force.
>  The Energy let off. That can be manipulated, Not the Flare 
itself. It is a Tech that almost anyone with training can do. In 
other words it is just the energy from the Flare. And I said that he 
directed it to Unicron. In other words his target. He is taking 
energy and Directing it towards Unicron. Now I did not say that I 
automatically hit him. That is up to you guys to decide. But it 
changes the Battle Field. It applies the use of energy to a new 
level. 
>   And of this whole fighting thing. Well if you guys want to then 
i can resign. it is that simple. I Play Dungeons and Dragons so I 
know the whole Psionics Class. It is the use of the mind and I know 
what the limits are.and if you remember in the post that I said " I 
just want your assurence on me being born."  He is not in the 
Bounderies of this univers yet. That is why he is getting a Remake. 
Turned from a Jet into a Beast warrior.thus giving him an physical 
essance in this world, Which would mean he needs to difuse his 
higher powers to be brought in. So his range on attacks will only be 
bout the max am mile and a half as long as he can picture what is 
going on.
> 
> Polar Claw <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> You're talking like he usually has that power though
> Airly. There's nothing to stop Primus from boosting
> his power temporarily, as I said, but then doing some
> internal damage as a result.  I know you guys are
> trying to avoid modding here, but at the end of the
> day, you can't have a realistic battle where two
> deities are actively involved without both deities
> manipulating things to their advantage. I'm all for
> avoiding modding, but the thing is that here, if you
> take a black and white stance with it, you'll make
> this into a clash of the titans with kid gloves, which
> will just look and feel rediculous, and totally
> UNREALISIC. 
> 
> --- airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote: 
> ---------------------------------
> I don't sure, that will do the bot too powerfull, what
> do you think 
> about that Azura and Robo?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw
> <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> > I know I'm not a GM but I couldn't help but noticing
> > the thread. Considering that Primus is around- it
> > could be possible for him to amplify a bot's powers,
> > like where Shadimus is about to become a channel to
> > Primus' powers- however, I think that it needs to be
> > treated like overloading anything- ie that the boost
> > results in severe internal damage that takes quite
> > some time for the bot in question to fully recover
> > from (lets just say on that front thet Shadimus is
> not
> > gonna be a pretty site once he's performed the
> conduit
> > attack on Unicron).
> > 
> >  --- airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote: 
> > ---------------------------------
> > Airly:
> > 
> > I think that it's alittle powerful too, 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic"
> > <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > OOC: Maybe, but still, manipulating solar flares
> is
> > a mighty 
> > power, 
> > > a bit too mighty for my tastes. Robo, Airly, what
> do
> > you think of 
> > > that? Is it too much for one bot that is not a
> NPC?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson
> > <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> > > > OOC: It puts Unicron in a tuff situation though.
> > He would need 
> > to 
> > > Defend Earth from the Flare or else it is Good Bye
> > to the Energon 
> > > and the Matrix. Or he lets the Solar Flare hit the
> > Earth. Either 
> > way 
> > > he has to move his Orbit thus throwing off his
> > attack sequence 
> > bro. 
> > > Think of it Stratigically.Almost like a game of
> > Chess and Unicron 
> > is 
> > > in Check.
> > > >

> flare
> > coming up to 
> > > Unicron would catch the earth at the 
> > > > same time. besides, he has this huge cannon
> fodder
> > army to block 
> > > > himself.
> > > >

> > wrote:
> > > > > Sonicc Storm:
> > > > > Closes his Eyes and begins to Concentrate on
